Class FileScriptingPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • weka.gui.scripting.ScriptingPanel
              • weka.gui.scripting.FileScriptingPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, ScriptExecutionListener, TitleUpdatedListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GroovyPanel, JythonPanel

    public abstract class FileScriptingPanel
extends ScriptingPanel
implements ScriptExecutionListener
    Supports loading/saving of files.
    Version:
    $Revision: 8034 $
    Author:
    fracpete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz), Sun Microsystems Inc (see TextComponentDemo.java)
    See Also:
